title: #603: 9/11 And The Deagel Report With Charlie Robinson
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Charlie Robinson back to the show to discuss 21st Anniversary of 9/11 and his latest episode of his podcast "Macroaggression" where he asks "Where Did All The People Go?" This was a banger. Thank you for your support.

Want To See Sam Tripoli Live? Grab Your Tickets at Samtripoli.com
